import { useState } from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent } from './ui/card'; import { Badge } from './ui/badge'; import { Dialog, DialogContent } from './ui/dialog'; import { X, Download, Calendar, Camera as CameraIcon } from 'lucide-react'; import { Button } from './ui/button'; interface EvidenceItem { id: string; incident_id: string; weapon_type: string; confidence: number; timestamp: string; camera_name: string; image_url: string; } const mockEvidence: EvidenceItem[] = [ { id: 'EV-001', incident_id: 'INC-001', weapon_type: 'Pistola', confidence: 0.94, timestamp: '2026-02-09 14:32:15', camera_name: 'Entrada Principal', image_url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1557597774-9d273605dfa9?w=800' }, { id: 'EV-002', incident_id: 'INC-002', weapon_type: 'Rifle', confidence: 0.87, timestamp: '2026-02-09 13:18:42', camera_name: 'Estacionamiento', image_url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551836022-d5d88e9218df?w=800' }, { id: 'EV-003', incident_id: 'INC-003', weapon_type: 'Cuchillo', confidence: 0.76, timestamp: '2026-02-09 12:05:28', camera_name: 'Pasillo Norte', image_url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1568605114967-8130f3a36994?w=800' }, { id: 'EV-004', incident_id: 'INC-004', weapon_type: 'Pistola', confidence: 0.91, timestamp: '2026-02-09 11:44:11', camera_name: 'Recepción', image_url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1486312338219-ce68d2c6f44d?w=800' }, { id: 'EV-005', incident_id: 'INC-005', weapon_type: 'Objeto sospechoso', confidence: 0.68, timestamp: '2026-02-09 10:22:33', camera_name: 'Salida Trasera', image_url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1518770660439-4636190af475?w=800' }, { id: 'EV-006', incident_id: 'INC-006', weapon_type: 'Pistola', confidence: 0.82, timestamp: '2026-02-09 09:15:47', camera_name: 'Entrada Principal', image_url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1557597774-9d273605dfa9?w=800' }, { id: 'EV-007', incident_id: 'INC-007', weapon_type: 'Rifle', confidence: 0.89, timestamp: '2026-02-09 08:42:19', camera_name: 'Estacionamiento', image_url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551836022-d5d88e9218df?w=800' }, { id: 'EV-008', incident_id: 'INC-008', weapon_type: 'Pistola', confidence: 0.93, timestamp: '2026-02-09 07:28:54', camera_name: 'Recepción', image_url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1486312338219-ce68d2c6f44d?w=800' }, { id: 'EV-009', incident_id: 'INC-009', weapon_type: 'Cuchillo', confidence: 0.79, timestamp: '2026-02-09 06:15:30', camera_name: 'Pasillo Norte', image_url: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1568605114967-8130f3a36994?w=800' }, ]; export function Evidence() { const [selectedEvidence, setSelectedEvidence] = useState(null); const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false); const handleImageClick = (evidence: EvidenceItem) => { setSelectedEvidence(evidence); setIsModalOpen(true); }; return (
